scripts.test-stable:
for version in 7.2 7.3 7.4 8.0 8.1 ; do if command -v php${version} > /dev/null 2>&1 ; then echo '
PHP: '${version}'
' && php${version} $(which composer) update --prefer-dist --no-interaction --prefer-stable > /dev/null 2>&1 && php${version} vendor/bin/phpunit ; fi ; done
scripts.test-lowest:
for version in 7.2 7.3 7.4 ; do if command -v php${version} > /dev/null 2>&1 ; then echo '
PHP: '${version}'
' && php${version} $(which composer) update --prefer-dist --no-interaction --prefer-lowest --prefer-stable > /dev/null 2>&1 && php${version} vendor/bin/phpunit ; fi ; done
